analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
analyzed: dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu diṭṭhe iva dhamme sukha somanassa bahulaḥ viharati yoni ca ssa āraddhā hoti āsavānam khayāya

original: Saṁvejanīyesu ṭhānesu saṁvejanena, saṁviggassa ca yoniso padhānena.
analyzed: sa vejanīyesu ṭhānesu sa vejanena saviggassa ca yonisaḥ padhānena

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṁ khayāyā”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu diṭṭhe iva dhamme sukha somanassa bahulaḥ viharati yoni ca ssa āraddhā hoti āsavānam khayāya ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
